com.google.gwt.widgetideas.client
Class Spinner

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.widgetideas.client.Spinner

public class Spinner
extends java.lang.Object

The Spinner provide two arrows for in- and decreasing values. A linked SpinnerListener

Nested Class Summary
static interface Spinner.SpinnerResources
          Default resources for spinning arrows

setInitialSpeed

public void setInitialSpeed(int initialSpeed)
Parameters:
initialSpeed - the initial speed of the spinner. Higher values mean lower speed, default value is 7

setMax

public void setMax(long max)
Parameters:
max - the maximum value. Will not have any effect if constrained is set to false

setMaxStep

Parameters:
maxStep - the maximum step for this spinner

setMin

Parameters:
minStep - the minimum step for this spinner

setValue

                     boolean fireEvent)
Parameters:
value - sets the current value of this spinner
fireEvent - fires value changed event if set to true
